description: Defines a public class 'Recipe' representing a recipe entity with properties like id, title, description, imageUrl, ingredients, instructions, and rating. Includes a constructor, copyWith method, and overrides for equality and hashCode.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: A data model class encapsulating the properties of a recipe for use within the application.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Returns a new instance of Recipe with specified properties replaced, allowing for immutable modifications.
Overrides equality operator to compare Recipes based on their 'id' field.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Overrides hashCode to produce a hash based on the 'id', ensuring consistency with equality.
